feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

** Please note version bump, minimum requirements for PHP are now PHP 8.2 *****

  • Add BTCPay payment capabilities by @Nisaba in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9520
  • Updates for einvoicing schemas/models by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9533
  • Update PaymentLibrariesSeeder for BTCPay by @Nisaba in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9534
  • Fixes for XInvoice by @LarsK1 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9523
  • Updates for BTC payment driver by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9535
  • Fix: Update Nordigen to properly handle small money transfer amounts by @yannickboy15 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9537
  • Update PayPal integration to support advanced cards by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9550
  • Update labels and fix custom company values in Invoice Preview by @dshoreman in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9556
  • Updates for currencies by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9565
  • "Real" entity numbers in Invoice Designer/Settings previews by @dshoreman in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9558
  • Tailwind v3 by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9349
  • Updated translations by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9567
  • updated resources by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9568
  • Update client information in the portal by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9570
  • Trim regional locales to two-letter country codes by @dshoreman in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9571
  • Updated translation strings by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9572
  • BTCPay : Improve refund by @Nisaba in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9560
  • v5.9.0 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9577

New Contributors

  • @Nisaba made their first contribution in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9520
  • @yannickboy15 made their first contribution in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9537

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.8.57...v5.9.0

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.9.1
New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.9.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for BTCpay
  • v5.9.2 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9591

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.9.1...v5.9.2

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.9.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes a bug causing reminders not to send for users who have lock_invoices option turned on.
  • v5.9.3 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9604

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.9.2...v5.9.3

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.9.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • BTCPay updates by @Nisaba in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9605
  • Add twig linting by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9607
  • v5.9.4 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9609
  • Fixes for timezones
  • Fixes for Krona decimal resolution
  • Fixes for mobile HTML variable replacements

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.9.3...v5.9.4
